Rice and Rocks

Enhanced fixed-layout EPUB, freelance project, 2016

Summary

Rice and Rocks is a childrenâ€™s book published by Wise Ink. I was contracted to create three different fixed-layout versions, one enhanced version with music and two more versions without the music enhancement, in EPUB3 and KF8/Mobi.

Role

Developer

Skills Used

  • InDesign
  • EPUB3
  • CSS
  • XML
  • XHTML
  • JavaScript
  • Audacity

Description

On page load, the music file begins (hidden from the page). I edited to music to fade in and out so as not to feel jarring upon page turn
